snippet: Hertz Global Holdings moved closer to winding down one of the longer-running takeover sagas in recent memory, as the rental car company said on Thursday that it had won regulatory approval for its $2.3 billion takeover of the Dollar Thrifty...
abstract: Hertz Global Holdings moved closer to winding down one of the longer-running takeover sagas in recent memory, as the rental car company said on Thursday that it had won regulatory approval for its $2.3 billion takeover of the Dollar Thrifty Automotive Group.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Hertz Wins F.T.C. Approval of Its Deal for Dollar Thrifty
